name: O-Cedar H2prO Flat Mop System | Quick Cleaning Tool | Clean with Clean Water | Machine Washable Reusable Microfiber Mop Pad | Safe on Wood Floors, Vinyl, Tile, Baseboards, Walls
short_description: KEEP CLEAN AND DIRTY WATER SEPARATE: The dual-tank system keeps clean and dirty water completely separate, so every swipe uses fresh water—reducing cross-contamination and boosting clean results. 1.2L water tank cleans up to 650 sq ft per fill.

COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Slim profile fits under sinks and is easy to carry—perfect for apartments, dorms, or multi-level homes. The compact tank is designed for quick room-to-room refills with less waste.
BUILT-IN POWERFUL WATER JETS: Integrated jets evenly saturate the pad, offering full coverage for a consistent clean—no batteries required.
SUSTAINABLE, BATTERY-FREE SYSTEM: Includes 1 reusable mop head replacement, refillable tank, and no batteries needed—better for the planet and your wallet.
WASHABLE & REUSABLE MOP HEAD: Durable microfiber mop pad withstands repeated machine washes—no need for costly disposables.
TELESCOPIC HANDLE WITH EXTENDED REACH: Adjusts up to 56 inches to help reduce back strain and reach under furniture or tight spaces.
EXTRA-WIDE MOP HEAD (4.33 in. x 15.95 in.): Covers more floor in fewer passes for faster, more efficient cleaning on hardwood, tile, and other sealed surfaces.
SAFE ON ALL SEALED FLOOR TYPES: Cleans hardwood, laminate, vinyl, ceramic, and more—tough on dirt, gentle on surfaces.
CUSTOMIZABLE CLEANING SOLUTION: Fill the tank with water first, then add your preferred floor cleaner (up to 2 teaspoons), or use water only—you're in control of your clean.
MULTI-BENEFIT PERFORMANCE: Engineered for deep cleaning with a compact frame, ergonomic handle, and superior floor coverage—ideal for modern cleaning routines.
product_description: Compact Size, Big Cleaning Power. The O-Cedar H2PrO Flat Mop System delivers a deep, streak-free clean in any space. Its dual-tank system keeps clean and dirty water 100% separate, so every swipe uses fresh water. The detachable water tank fills easily at the sink—just add water plus 2 tsp of your favorite cleaner if you like. Battery-free water jets evenly soak the mop pad for full coverage, while the lightweight, compact design makes it easy to carry and store. Featuring machine-washable, reusable mop heads, this system offers a cost-effective, eco-friendly clean—when you’re finished cleaning just wash your mop pad and lay flat to dry. What is the H2prO™ Flat Mop System and how is it different? H2prO™ is a flat mop system with a dual-tank bucket and built-in water jets that spray clean water directly onto the mop pad. Does it need batteries or power? No. H2prO™ is fully manual. The water jets are activated by pressing the mop into the rinse chamber. What types of floors is it best for? It is ideal for sealed hardwood, tile, laminate, vinyl, and even vertical surfaces like baseboards and walls. Can I use cleaning solution in the water tank? Use water only or add up to 2 teaspoons of floor cleaner. Do not use bleach or PACS, as they are not designed for the H2prO™ system. How do I control the amount of water on the pad? The rinse chamber’s spring-loaded lever lets you control how much water is sprayed onto the pad. Does it clean with just water? Yes. The microfiber removes over 99% of E. coli and Staph. aureus from pre-finished hardwood flooring and ceramic tile using tap water, as tested at an independent accredited lab. How tall is the handle? The adjustable handle extends up to 56 inches for comfortable cleaning. How often should I replace the mop pad? Replace the mop pad when it becomes worn, and keep extras on hand so you are always prepared. Is there a warranty? Yes. H2prO™ is warranted against defective materials or workmanship. For full details visit our website.
